Html:
I was doing fairly well with sourcemap debugging but now I can not hit breakpoints in a particular file.

I spent a few hours troubleshooting....no dice.

Is there a way to disable the sourcemap debugging in visual studio/IE 10 or do I need to delete all of the source map files?

Thanks,
Jon
You'll need to delete the .map files. There isn't a toggleable option to ignore them.

Cool, thanks! - that's what I did.

I wanted to make sure I wasn't missing options anyplace for the plugin.

It was just that one file....not sure what is up.  It's a rather large file (a viewmodel on a single page app).

Many other Typescript files are working correctly w/ source maps fwiw.

Thanks much!
